channel.title: Curious about startup taxes or how to structure a company? Check out this Zero to Scale episode
channel.description:
We take a deep dive into taxes with Josh Bauerle of CPA on Fire and he shares how to structure your company for maximum savings.
[http://zerotoscale.com/86](http://zerotoscale.com/86)
